alert.note: Alert for Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 3:55PM EDT until May 30 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Lanier County in south central Georgia... Northeastern Lowndes County in south central Georgia... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 354 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mayday, or 9 miles south of Lakeland, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Moody Air Force Base, Naylor, Courthouse, Greenwood, Hansell and Stockton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
